Sentencas: The volatile boron from boron-containing sealing materials often reacts with lanthanum-containing cathode, leading to the formation of LaBO3 and consequently significant degradation of cathode.
Titulo: Reducing the reaction between boron-containing sealing glass-ceramics and lanthanum-containing cathode: Effect of Bi2O3

Sentencas: The reaction between boron-containing sealing glass-ceramics and lanthanum-containing cathode thus presents a challenge for the development of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Reducing the reaction between boron-containing sealing glass-ceramics and lanthanum-containing cathode: Effect of Bi2O3

Sentencas: Here we report for the first time that such a reaction can be significantly reduced by Bi2O3 dopant in sealing glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Reducing the reaction between boron-containing sealing glass-ceramics and lanthanum-containing cathode: Effect of Bi2O3

Sentencas: In particular, the formation of LaBO3 can be prohibited in reaction couple between glass containing 9 mol.% Bi2O3 and lanthanum strontium cobalt ferrite (LSCF) cathode.
Titulo: Reducing the reaction between boron-containing sealing glass-ceramics and lanthanum-containing cathode: Effect of Bi2O3

Sentencas: The addition of Bi2O3 enhances the [BO3] ->
Titulo: Reducing the reaction between boron-containing sealing glass-ceramics and lanthanum-containing cathode: Effect of Bi2O3

Sentencas: [BO4] transition in glass structure and therefore improves the thermal stability of boron species in glass matrix.
Titulo: Reducing the reaction between boron-containing sealing glass-ceramics and lanthanum-containing cathode: Effect of Bi2O3

Sentencas: In addition, Bi2O3 dopant also favors the formation of BiBO3, which dramatically reduces boron volatility from sealing glass-ceramics.
Titulo: Reducing the reaction between boron-containing sealing glass-ceramics and lanthanum-containing cathode: Effect of Bi2O3

Sentencas: The reported results provide an effective approach for solving the sealing challenge.
Titulo: Reducing the reaction between boron-containing sealing glass-ceramics and lanthanum-containing cathode: Effect of Bi2O3
